title: Book a Visit | UIC Admissions
contents: Explore UIC  Visit Virtually  Apply    S      Search Input     Submit        M       Book a Visit      Group Visits  Self Guided Tours             Home  You are here     Home  You are here                          Due to the COVID-19 pandemic UIC continues to accept undergraduate first-year and transfer applications for the Fall 2020 semester.            Experience UIC in person    See firsthand what UIC has to offer  Is UIC the right fit for you? Come see for yourself! Schedule group visits , student visits , self-guided tours , and more to explore UIC.  Our visit options focus on the undergraduate experience. To learn about graduate programs, contact the UIC Graduate College .   Campus Visits and Tours   Individual VISITS  Campus visits for prospective undergraduate students and their guests.  GROUP VISITS  Campus visits for 9-12th grade high school and community-based organizations with groups of 10 or more students.  Space is limited, so plan to register in advance.  If you need special assistance (wheelchair, signers, etc.) during your visit, please call us at (312) 996-4350 so we can make arrangements before you arrive.                            Related Resources    Directions, Parking, and Places to Stay  Campus Maps  Contact Us                  UnderGraduate      Graduate & Professional                 Office of Admissions  Main Office  1200 West Harrison Street Chicago, IL 60607-7161 Phone: (312) 996-4350 Contact UIC Admissions    Visitors Center  1220 West Harrison Street Chicago, IL 60607-7161 Phone: (312) 413-1726                 Mailing Address  Undergraduate  Office of Undergraduate Admissions (MC 018) University of Illinois at Chicago 1200 West Harrison Street, Suite 1100 Chicago, IL 60607-7161 Contact Undergraduate Admissions     Graduate & Professional  The graduate and professional application process is paperless. Please do not mail materials unless expressly requested.
